column1: # Speed2 : rotation speed of the boat
# time   : -  > 0:  if the boat has reached the point before the time is spent
#                   else if the time is spent and the boat has not reached the point
column2: server will pass to the next point

column1: #          -  < 0:  lets server calculate when the boat reachs the point (/!\ don't use time < 0 when you do a rotation with the boat.)
